subject: Canoe-Kayak
Olympic Games (2016)
Olympic Games
Canoes and Canoeing
lead_paragraph: The slalom canoeists Eric Hurd and Jeff Larimer finished 12th at the London Games, but whether they go forward to Rio de Janeiro will depend on their financing.
snippet: The slalom canoeists Eric Hurd and Jeff Larimer finished 12th at the London Games, but whether they go forward to Rio de Janeiro will depend on their financing.
